name: FURY ROAD
description: Players can only have one patroller at a time.

name: FLAGSTONE MINES
description: Players can hire any number of workers per turn.

name: BIG GAME HUNTERS
description: Each player gets an extra [2 gold] during each of their upkeeps.

name: HARD TIMES MILL
description: Workers cost an extra [1 gold] to hire.

name: NO RUSH 15 MINUTES
description: Prevent all damage until after each player has taken 4 turns.

name: DAGGERFALL PRISON CAMP
description: Hiring workers doesn't cost a card. (Track how many workers you have some other way.)

name: MYSTICAL FOREST
description: Whenever you would ready a unit or hero during your turn, you may put a +1/+1 rune on it instead.

name: BURIAL GROUNDS
description: Whenever a hero dies, it's gone forever this game.

name: PINNACLE
description: Heroes can cast ultimate spells even if they aren't max level and even if they arrived that turn. Dead heroes must wait an extra turn to be resummoned.

name: VORTOSS RUINS
description: Players can't build the heroes' hall or tech lab add-ons, but automatically get their effects.

name: BLOODBOWL
description: All units have +1 ATK and haste.

name: LOST TEMPLE
description: Players ignore all tech building requirements and don't need heroes to cast spells.
